summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Ambulatorio Infermieristico modifications. Successfully verified login, ambulatory selection, agenda layouts, statistics export, and modulistica functionality. Critical issue found: appointment dialog not opening when clicking time slots, preventing appointment creation and 'Nuovo paziente' functionality testing.

ui_bugs.issue: Appointment dialog not opening when clicking on time slots
ui_bugs.impact: Prevents appointment creation and 'Nuovo paziente' functionality

ui_bugs.issue: Session expires quickly during testing, requiring frequent re-login
ui_bugs.impact: Affects user experience and testing continuity

integration_issues.issue: Cannot test 'Nuovo paziente' button functionality due to dialog not opening
PICC management sheets not accessible through patient section

passed_tests: Login with Domenico/infermiere credentials working correctly
Ambulatory selection showing both PTA Centro and Villa delle Ginestre
PTA Centro agenda displaying both PICC and MED columns correctly
Villa delle Ginestre agenda showing only PICC column (clean layout as requested)
Statistics page loading with PDF and Excel export buttons
PDF export button opening print window/dialog
Excel export button triggering CSV download
MED tab in Modulistica showing Anagrafica and Medicazione forms
Word and Print buttons present for MED forms (2 Word buttons, 2 Print buttons found)
Navigation between main sections (Agenda, Statistiche, Modulistica) working
User interface responsive and properly styled
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix appointment dialog not opening when clicking time slots. This prevents testing of core appointment creation functionality and 'Nuovo paziente' feature. Also investigate PICC management sheet access through patient section. Session management timeout should be increased for better user experience.

success_percentage.frontend: 70% (Core navigation and export features working, appointment dialog critical issue)
